column4: Repeating: I need help uninstalling ITALC completely. Everytime I try to I still get error libItalcCore.so missing when trying to run ITALC. This started after attempting to install from source (it didn't apparently give any build errors though)
...are there any specific directories I can completely remove that would contain anything ITALC that may be left on the system after uninstallation?
unless you installed it in /opt/italc or something.
the lack of a program files dir is why package management was invented.
